What would you like to ask about? ≺Selection Dialog≻The Vana'diel Chocobo Society. Time required. Chocobo attributes. Care schedule. Caring for your chocobo. Feed. Abilities and personality. Retirement. Matchmaking. Calling chocobos in the field. Items. Lost chicks. Nothing.≺Prompt≻
Just let me know if you ever get curious!≺Prompt≻
The Vana'diel Chocobo Society, or VCS for short, is an international organization designed to train and dispatch chocogirls and chocoguys to stables across Vana'diel.≺Prompt≻
They provide courses on practical chocobo riding and the proper ways to care for a chocobo, as well as working to improve the treatment of chocobos from here to Aht Urhgan.≺Prompt≻
Anyone can join as long as they love chocobos. The VCS will help you with anything you need.≺Prompt≻
Chicks hatch from eggs, grow into young chocobos, and finally mature.≺Prompt≻
They grow much faster than people do. Usually it takes about 1 month (Earth time) before you can ride your chocobo.≺Prompt≻
The chocobo's traits are determined by the way in which you care for your animal. Without proper planning, you won't be able to raise the type of chocobo that you want.≺Prompt≻
But don't worry, because you have us to help! We're all in this together!≺Prompt≻
Ask about which attribute? ≺Selection Dialog≻Strength. Endurance. Discernment. Receptivity. Energy. Affection. Satisfaction. Nothing.≺Prompt≻

“Strength” is a term used to describe the chocobo's leg power. The more strength a chocobo has, the faster it will be able to run. Rental chocobos have been raised with an emphasis on this attribute.≺Prompt≻
Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as “Physical attributes.”≺Prompt≻
“Endurance” is a term used to describe the chocobo's stamina. If your chocobo has high endurance, you will be able to ride it for a long period of time.≺Prompt≻
Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as “Physical attributes.”≺Prompt≻
“Discernment” is a must for anyone who wants their chocobo to learn new abilities. You may want to consider raising this attribute if you are interested in digging for treasure.≺Prompt≻
Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as “Mental attributes.”≺Prompt≻

“Receptivity” is a term used to describe the chocobo's sensitivity when dealing with others. You can foster receptivity in your chocobo by giving it lots of opportunities to communicate with other chocobos.≺Prompt≻
Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as “Mental attributes.”≺Prompt≻

“Energy” is a term used to describe the amount of power the chocobo needs to stay active for the day. If your chocobo has a lot of energy, care plans are more likely to be successful and you can provide more direct care for your chocobo.≺Prompt≻
You can restore your chocobo's energy by feeding it, so remember not to skip out on feeding time after a demanding schedule!≺Prompt≻
“Affection” is the most important attribute of all. Your care schedule will fall flat if you don't show your chocobo proper affection!≺Prompt≻
You can raise your chocobo's affection by feeding it greens and caring for it on a regular basis.≺Prompt≻

If you really want to raise your chocobo's affection quickly, you can give it ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, but I can't recommend doing so unless absolutely necessary.≺Prompt≻
“Satisfaction” is a term used to describe how full or hungry your chocobo is. If your chocobo is full, it will gain a lot of energy before the next day.≺Prompt≻
However, when the chocobo is very hungry, its energy will hardly recover at all and its affection will rapidly decrease.≺Prompt≻

What would you like to ask about? ≺Selection Dialog≻What is a care schedule? Basic care. Resting. Taking a walk. Listening to music. Exercising alone. Exercising in a group. Interacting with children. Interacting with chocobos. Carrying packages. Exhibiting to the public. Delivering messages. Digging for treasure. Acting in a play. Nothing.≺Prompt≻
A care schedule is a series of plans that you set up for your chocobo so that we can take care of it while you are away.≺Prompt≻
How you want us to care for your chocobo each day is completely up to you.≺Prompt≻
You can register up to four plans at once, each for up to 7 days (Earth time).≺Prompt≻
When you come to check on your chocobo, we will give you a report on the results. You should listen closely to the report and use it as reference when deciding on a new schedule.≺Prompt≻
With the basic care plan, we will provide the minimum level of care for your chocobo. This plan is the most stable, and your chocobo will probably not experience any sudden changes.≺Prompt≻
The basic care plan is good for those who don't want their chocobo's traits to change much or are still unsure of what kind of schedule to choose.≺Prompt≻
You can select the basic care plan the moment you start raising your chocobo.≺Prompt≻
The rest plan's name speaks for itself. We will give your chocobo a rest in order to restore its energy and cure any status abnormalities.≺Prompt≻
However, your chocobo will not be able to eat any food you give it during the plan, because it will be in a deep sleep.≺Prompt≻

We can take your chocobo for a walk in town to improve its physical attributes of strength and endurance. However, it will have a negative effect on its mental attributes of discernment and receptivity.≺Prompt≻
Listening to music will improve your chocobo's mental attributes of discernment and receptivity. However, it will have a negative effect on its physical attributes of strength and endurance.≺Prompt≻
Exercising alone will significantly improve your chocobo's strength. On the other hand, its mental attributes will markedly decrease.≺Prompt≻
If the chocobo is strong, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo is weak, then you shouldn't push it too hard.≺Prompt≻
Exercising with chocobos will build your animal's endurance. On the other hand, its mental attributes will decrease.≺Prompt≻
If the chocobo has high endurance, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo's endurance is low, then you shouldn't push it too hard.≺Prompt≻
Interacting with children helps your chocobo become a more discerning creature by interacting with people.≺Prompt≻
However, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes, as no strenuous exercise is involved.≺Prompt≻
If the chocobo has good discernment, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good discernment, then you shouldn't push it too hard.≺Prompt≻
Interacting with other chocobos in the field will improve the chocobo's receptivity by fostering its communication skills.≺Prompt≻
But because the focus is on communication and not exercise, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes.≺Prompt≻
If the chocobo has good receptivity, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good receptivity, then you shouldn't push it too hard.≺Prompt≻
You can choose to have your chocobo help deliver packages. Not only will this improve its physical attributes, but you will even receive payment for your services!≺Prompt≻
The downside is that your chocobo's mental attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo, or you might find yourself getting cold treatment.≺Prompt≻

You can choose to exhibit your chocobo to the public, which will allow anyone visiting the chocobo stables to take a look at your animal. Being the center of attention will help improve your chocobo's mental attributes.≺Prompt≻
The downside is that your chocobo's physical attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo afterwards. Also, you will receive payment for this service.≺Prompt≻
You can choose to have your chocobo deliver official messages for the nation. Not only will this improve its strength, but you will even receive payment for your services!≺Prompt≻
However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.≺Prompt≻
You can have your chocobo help out VCS finances by digging for treasure. This will also improve the chocobo's discernment.≺Prompt≻
The VCS will sell the item and use the money for the organization's benefit, but will provide you with payment for your services.≺Prompt≻
However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.≺Prompt≻
You can choose to have your chocobo act as an extra in a play to improve its receptivity.≺Prompt≻
You will receive payment in accordance with the chocobo's performance. However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.≺Prompt≻
What would you like to ask about? ≺Selection Dialog≻A general explanation. Watching over your chocobo. Telling a story. Scolding. Competing. Taking a walk. Nothing.≺Prompt≻
In addition to setting the chocobo's schedule, you can also care directly for your chocobo whenever you like.≺Prompt≻
Caring for your chocobo will increase its affection for you.≺Prompt≻
On the other hand, a chocobo that receives too much care will lose energy more rapidly when engaging in activities. If you do nothing but care for your chocobo, it will become fatigued.≺Prompt≻
However, not caring enough for your chocobo will have a negative effect on your relationship, so it is important to find a balance.≺Prompt≻
You can watch over your chocobo whenever you like.≺Prompt≻
Your fond gaze can communicate even more than a touch and will not have a very tiring effect on the animal.≺Prompt≻
You can tell the chocobo a story you know. This will foster the animal's sensibilities.≺Prompt≻
I've heard that by listening to the story, the chocobo might even realize it has powers it never noticed before. (I've never seen it happen before, though...)≺Prompt≻
Sometimes your chocobo might start acting spoiled or refuse to do anything but sleep. In such times, you will need to firmly scold it.≺Prompt≻
This will shame the animal and have an effect on its receptivity.≺Prompt≻
Competing against other chocobos will cultivate your animal's ambitious spirit and is highly effective for bored chocobos.≺Prompt≻
You can take your chocobo out for a walk in the field. You will be able to choose more destinations as your chocobo grows.≺Prompt≻
I like to take the chocobo out often, too, but I'm sure it prefers going out with you.≺Prompt≻
Leaving the stables every once in a while allows your chocobo to experience new sights and sounds. Maybe you'll even discover something new together!≺Prompt≻
What would you like to know about? ≺Selection Dialog≻Why feeding is important. Vegetables. Wildgrasses. Carrots. Worms. Medicines. Pastes. Nothing.≺Prompt≻
Chocobos digest feed quickly, so they are often hungry.≺Prompt≻
However, they also restore energy at a rapid pace. If you do not feed your chocobo properly, it will be unable to restore enough energy.≺Prompt≻
The chocobo stables will provide your chocobo with the minimum amount of feed required for the animal to survive, but you need to provide more in order to ensure its healthy growth.≺Prompt≻
At the same time, feeding your chocobo too much can result in a stomachache. Remember to strike a balance with both the variety and quantity of feed you give to your animal!≺Prompt≻
Some types of feed have special effects, so it is important not to neglect your chocobo's diet if you want to raise a good chocobo.≺Prompt≻
There are different methods of acquiring these special types of feed, so be on the lookout for them!≺Prompt≻
Just ≺Set Color #5≻trade≺Set Color #1≻ the feed to an advanced chocobo trainer, and they will give it to your chocobo.≺Prompt≻
This is the standard variety of chocobo feed, among which ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ are most popular.≺Prompt≻

Chocobos also seem to enjoy ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ and ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻.≺Prompt≻
These greens are the most effective in satisfying a chocobo's hunger. Chocobos also enjoy the taste, which raises affection for their owner.≺Prompt≻
Wildgrasses are a type of medicinal herb. They do not taste very good, but are highly effective at curing status abnormalities.≺Prompt≻

So although they look similar to ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, the effects are different.≺Prompt≻

In addition, ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ is effective for illness, and ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ for a stomachache. It's a good idea to remember which herb to use in each situation.≺Prompt≻
Carrots are high in nutrition, and will have an effect on the chocobo's strength and discernment.≺Prompt≻

≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, for example, affect the chocobo's physical attributes, and ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ are good for its mental attributes. ≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%ｂ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ are in a category of their own.≺Prompt≻
Remember, though, that the results are very slight, and keeping a good care schedule is a far more efficient way to alter your chocobo's attributes.≺Prompt≻
Using worms as feed can have a variety of effects. They might look disgusting, but their effectiveness is not to be ignored!≺Prompt≻

For example, ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ will dramatically increase your chocobo's affection, and ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ will restore its energy.≺Prompt≻
But watch out for the side effects... Give the chocobo a worm at the wrong time, and all your effort could come to nothing...≺Prompt≻

The most curious of all the worms is the ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. At first it may not seem to have any effect, but looks are deceiving...≺Prompt≻
Medicines can cure a chocobo in the blink of an eye.≺Prompt≻

≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ will restore your chocobo's energy in full, making it easier to care for and ensuring that the care schedule goes smoothly.≺Prompt≻

≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ are effective for most status abnormalities, restoring instant health to your chocobo. Of course, you still need to continue caring for your chocobo so it can fully recover.≺Prompt≻
A potion can also help fill a chocobo's stomach, so they can be useful when you are short on feed.≺Prompt≻
Feed can be ground into paste for chicks to eat.≺Prompt≻
You can make paste yourself with some cooking skill. If you don't have enough cooking skill yourself, then you might want to ask a friend to make some for you.≺Prompt≻
Chicks can also eat regular feed, though.≺Prompt≻
Which would you like to ask about? ≺Selection Dialog≻Abilities. Temperament. Weather preferences. Nothing.≺Prompt≻
Your chocobo may learn useful abilities during the course of its life at the stables.≺Prompt≻
For example, Auto-Regen will increase the rate at which your chocobo restores energy. Such an ability is sure to come in handy in a variety of situations.≺Prompt≻
Your chocobo learns abilities by listening to your words, so if you know of any story that you think might interest the animal, you should tell it often.≺Prompt≻
But remember, your chocobo can't learn all of the abilities there are. It can only learn two...or at least, that's what I read.≺Prompt≻
The chocobo's temperament is determined when it is just a chick. Its temperament and attributes are somehow related, but I'm not really sure how.≺Prompt≻
Chocobos generally like sunny days, but they could grow to like other kinds of weather depending on how they are raised.≺Prompt≻
Chocobos pay attention to the air outside when they go on walks, and grow to prefer that type of weather because of the memories.≺Prompt≻

Make the animal's schedule around its preferred weather days, and plans are more likely to succeed. However, if the chocobo has a favored type of weather, it also dislikes certain conditions, creating a weak point to watch for.≺Prompt≻
You can choose to retire your chocobo at any time after it has fully matured.≺Prompt≻
After retirement, the VCS will take up caring for the chocobo where you left off, so you need not worry about its welfare.≺Prompt≻

When your chocobo retires, you will receive ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. Be sure not to lose it.≺Prompt≻

You can use the ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ to register your chocobo to call in the field or for matchmaking purposes after retirement. All you need to do is trade it to a VCS member.≺Prompt≻
The empty stall created after your animal retires can be used for raising other chocobos, so if you happen to come across another egg, you can bring it here to start all over again!≺Prompt≻
When your chocobo is mature enough, you can breed it with another chocobo. If the chocobo lays an egg, the chick will inherit the traits of its parents.≺Prompt≻

You will need ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ and ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ if you want to breed your chocobo. Apparently, you also need some kind of ticket that they sell at the stables in Upper Jeuno.≺Prompt≻

You can ask one of the VCS members to issue you a chococard, or if your chocobo is already retired, just trade them ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻.≺Prompt≻
I don't really know that much about it, but you should probably try matching your chocobo up with several different animals and seeing what the results are.≺Prompt≻

When your chocobo is mature enough, you can call it in the field using ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻.≺Prompt≻
You need to let a member of the VCS know which chocobo you want to respond to your call, because they must choose a saddle that fits your chocobo's attributes.≺Prompt≻
That also means that when your chocobo's attributes change or it learns a new ability, you should probably let the VCS member know, too.≺Prompt≻

When you want to register a retired chocobo to respond to your call in the field, trade ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ to a VCS member.≺Prompt≻
Also, the ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻'s power will grow weak after you've used it several times.≺Prompt≻
If this happens, just trade it to a VCS member and they will give you a new one for a fee.≺Prompt≻

What would you like to ask about? ≺Selection Dialog≻≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. Chococards. ≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. Nothing.≺Prompt≻

≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ proves that you are your chocobo's caretaker.≺Prompt≻
With this card, you can register a retired chocobo to respond to your call in the field or get a chococard for matchmaking.≺Prompt≻
If you lose it, you won't be able to get another one, so keep it in a safe place!≺Prompt≻

You can use ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ to call your chocobo in the field to use as a mount.≺Prompt≻
The more you use it, the weaker it will get, so eventually you will need to exchange it to a VCS member for a new one.≺Prompt≻

Only people who have been approved by the VCS President can get ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, so good luck with that...≺Prompt≻
Chococards are documents that contain all the details about a chocobo's attributes and condition. They are divided into two types--one for each gender.≺Prompt≻
If you trade one to the person who's in charge of matchmaking, he'll introduce your animal to another chocobo.≺Prompt≻

Chococards contain information on the chocobo's attributes and condition at the time the card is issued, so be sure to get a new card before using this service or the match will be arranged based on out-of-date information.≺Prompt≻

If you want a chococard for a retired chocobo, then you must trade ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ to a VCS member.≺Prompt≻

Read which chapter? ≺Selection Dialog≻1. “The Heart of Venture Roll.” 2. “Rules of the Roll.” 3. “Putting the Book Down.”≺Prompt≻

Venture roll is a competitive game played with dice similar to those used by corsairs. The objective is to roll until your cumulative total comes as close to 11 as possible without going over.≺Prompt≻

Until you reach or go over 11, you may continue rolling (≺Set Color #5≻doubling up≺Set Color #1≻) as many times as the table time limit allows (≺Numeric Parameter 8≻ ≺Singular/Plural Choice (Parameter 8)≻[minute/minutes], Earth time).≺Prompt≻
In addition to doubling up, you may also decline to roll the dice and stay with your current total (≺Set Color #5≻hold fast≺Set Color #1≻).≺Prompt≻

If your total ever goes over 11, you will automatically lose the game, regardless of the totals of other players. Knowing the right time to hold fast is one of the keys to staying in the match.≺Prompt≻

Once all the players have held fast, the game is over and the results are announced. The player closest to 11 is declared the winner and receives all the gil in the pot (the original participation fees of all the players).≺Prompt≻
Objective: Roll a six-sided die as many times as necessary to achieve a total as close to 11 as possible. You lose the instant your total exceeds 11.≺Prompt≻
If two or more players are the closest to 11 at the end of a match, the game is considered a ≺Set Color #5≻draw≺Set Color #1≻ and all participation fees are repaid in full.≺Prompt≻
Once the game has started, fees will not be refunded for any reason unless the match results in a draw.≺Prompt≻

Ask about what? ≺Selection Dialog≻Nothing. Synergy furnaces. Synergy overview. Synergy procedure. Synergy recipes. Fewell replenishment. Materials for sale. Synergy techniques. Trading cinder.≺Prompt≻

The synergy furnaces you see around town are provided as a public service by the Bastokan Institute of Synergy Research, to ensure that no synergist is ever far away from the tools of their trade.≺Prompt≻

The synergist must provide his or her own ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, as well as any materials to be used in the synergy process. Provided those conditions are met, synergy furnaces may be used free of charge.≺Prompt≻
Needless to say, only one party may operate any given furnace at once.≺Prompt≻
Fortunately, there are multiple furnaces installed throughout town. If the furnace before you is already in use, please seek out an unused one elsewhere, or wait patiently for your turn.≺Prompt≻
You may think of synergy as an evolved form of synthesis. It is a discipline full of heretofore unimagined possibilities, but one which demands consummate skill from its practitioners.≺Prompt≻

Like synthesis, synergy involves combining materials according to a prescribed recipe to yield oft-spectacular results. The rub is that each synergy recipe also dictates a certain elemental balance that must be achieved for the procedure to be successful.≺Prompt≻

This balance is achieved through skillful infusion of combustible elemental crystals that we synergists call “fewell.” To begin the synergy process, you'll have to feed the furnace with fewell and get those flames burning!≺Prompt≻

As a general rule, the more complex the recipe, the more fewell it will require. Take care to check your stock before you fire up the furnace, lest you find its flames guttering out at a crucial moment.≺Prompt≻

With the belly of the furnace roaring up a storm, it's time to toss in your materials and start synergizing! Keep a close eye on the balance of elements and deploy fewell as necessary. Approach the prescribed elemental balance, and your item will take form, allowing you to remove it from the furnace.≺Prompt≻
The closer you are to the ideal elemental balance, the higher the quality of your finished product will be. In synergy, it pays to be a perfectionist!≺Prompt≻
But be forewarned: these furnaces can only sustain the elemental maelstrom swirling and storming inside them for so long.≺Prompt≻
If the furnace's durability should fail, the synergy process will be interrupted, and you will be forced to start anew.≺Prompt≻

Take heart, though, as any materials inside your ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ will remain intact. You may retrieve them or attempt the synergy process again as you see fit.≺Prompt≻
Any fewell consumed in the failed synergy attempt, on the other hand, will be permanently lost.≺Prompt≻
Synergists must also be wary of debris buildup, an unavoidable side effect of the volatile elemental reactions that take place within the synergy furnace.≺Prompt≻

Should too much debris be allowed to accumulate, the contents of the furnace will become unstable, potentially leading to unpleasant explosions and eruptions. Such accidents pose considerable risk to the synergy attempt in progress, as well as the physical well-being of the synergist, so be sure to exercise due caution!≺Prompt≻
You may be asking yourself, “Why, how in the name of Hildolf am I going to oversee all of these complicated procedures and variables by myself?”≺Prompt≻
Here's the good news: you don't have to! For you see, synergy furnaces are designed for use by multiple operators.≺Prompt≻

The more complex the recipe, the greater level of skill and hands-on manipulation it will demand. At such times, it would be in your best interest to seek out like-minded synergists and take on the challenge together.≺Prompt≻

Finally, it would be remiss of me not to make mention of ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, the curious substance whose properties are only now--with the emergence of synergy--becoming known to us.≺Prompt≻

Though there is much yet to be learned, our research has revealed that ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ may be used to bolster your equipment, if attached in a proper manner.≺Prompt≻

Mind you, ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ is not easy to come by, and I can offer no clues as to where or how to obtain it. Should you be fortunate enough to come across some in your travels, however, I encourage you to explore its potential.≺Prompt≻
Synergy is not a discipline for the faint of heart or mind, but with dedication and cooperation, there are great rewards to be reaped. May your career as a synergist prove fruitful!≺Prompt≻
First, you'll be wanting to check your fewell supply. You may do so by speaking with a synergy engineer such as myself, or by examining a synergy furnace.≺Prompt≻
You'll be needing at least one unit of fewell for each element dictated by your recipe. Without this, even the most skilled synergist cannot hope to succeed.≺Prompt≻
Should your fewell supply be in order, it's time to proceed with the synergy. If you are using one of these public synergy furnaces here, you'll need to examine it and lay claim to its use.≺Prompt≻

You may then deposit your ingredients. Should they correspond to a proper recipe, the synergy furnace will fire up automatically. Note that as a safety precaution, the furnace will not activate if the recipe is beyond your level of synergy skill.≺Prompt≻

From here, it becomes a race against the clock! Through skilled operation of the synergy furnace, you must achieve the elemental balance prescribed by the recipe before the furnace's durability fails.≺Prompt≻

Fortunately, synergy furnaces are outfitted with a wide array of features designed to aid the synergist in this demanding task. First, you'll want to confirm the current balance of elements within the furnace and compare it to your desired result.≺Prompt≻

Next, you can begin to ≺Set Color #5≻feed fewell≺Set Color #1≻ into the furnace to gradually raise the level of elemental concentration. Feeding fewell into the furnace until the required elemental balance is achieved is the most fundamental operation of synergy.≺Prompt≻

However, high concentrations of elemental power can lead to volatile and unpredictable reactions. Simply adding fewell haphazardly without making the necessary adjustments is a recipe for only one thing, and that's disaster.≺Prompt≻

If you sense that the furnace is on the verge of elemental overload, you'll want to employ the ≺Set Color #5≻safety lever≺Set Color #1≻ and ≺Set Color #5≻pressure handle≺Set Color #1≻ to prevent an unfortunate accident from occurring.≺Prompt≻
You'll also want to mind the laws of elemental ascendancy and opposition. Increasing the concentration of a particular element will cause its counterpart to decrease.≺Prompt≻

The furnace cannot sustain its power indefinitely, and will gradually lose durability as the synergy process continues. You'll need to perform periodic ≺Set Color #5≻furnace repair≺Set Color #1≻ should the furnace near its breaking point.≺Prompt≻

It is also possible to ≺Set Color #5≻recycle strewn fewell≺Set Color #1≻ during synergy. While this will not impact the success or failure of the process itself, it will result in a greater amount of salvageable cinder produced as a by-product.≺Prompt≻

This cinder is of great interest to our researchers back at the institute. As such, we have introduced a reward system through which quality samples can be traded in for an assortment of synergy-related wares.≺Prompt≻

As marvelous an apparatus as the synergy furnace may be, keep in mind that the technology is still in its infancy, and highly unstable. There may be times when accidents occur despite the best efforts of the synergist.≺Prompt≻

For your safety, we recommend stepping as far away from the furnace as possible at the first sign of danger. Some synergists claim that giving the furnace a good thwack is also effective in preventing such accidents, but this is pure madness, if you ask me!≺Prompt≻
You will also find that there are numerous techniques that can be applied to make the synergy procedure go even more smoothly.≺Prompt≻
In many cases, expertise and knowledge acquired through crafting will serve you in synergy as well. To truly master synergy, one must master crafting as well.≺Prompt≻
Now let us return to the synergy process itself. As your elemental balance approaches that prescribed by the recipe, the furnace will signal you, and you may retrieve your finished product.≺Prompt≻

If the furnace is still holding strong at this time, you may choose to keep working to achieve an even closer balance. The closer you come to the ideal balance, the higher the quality of your finished product will be.≺Prompt≻
Indeed, many synergy masters consider these waning moments after the signal to be the time to really show off their skills! Why, if they manage to achieve an elemental surge...≺Prompt≻
What's an elemental surge, you ask? Why, it's a miraculous phenomenon that occurs rarely--ever so rarely--upon feeding the furnace fewell.≺Prompt≻

The elements react just in the right way, creating a miraculous reaction that brings the level of elemental concentration to exactly the desired level. Truly a boon from the Goddess for any synergist, no?≺Prompt≻
...And that is the synergy process in a nutshell. There's quite a bit of information to take in, so don't hesitate to return any time for a refresher course.≺Prompt≻

Much like synthesis, to fashion items through synergy, you will need to follow a recipe. We synergy engineers are always unearthing new recipes, and are happy to share with you those suitable for your level of skill.≺Prompt≻
Unlike synthesis, however, a synergy recipe is more than just a list of ingredients. There is also a required elemental balance that must be attained to achieve your desired result.≺Prompt≻

Simple recipes involve only small doses of a limited number of elements, but more complex ones require the synergist to skillfully juggle wide ranges of elements in extremely high concentrations.≺Prompt≻

The ingredients, you will have to remember on your own. The required elemental balance, however, may be reviewed at any time during the synergy process by observing the readings on the synergy furnace.≺Prompt≻

In particular, recipes through which the curious substance known as ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ can be attached to equipment are creating quite a buzz among synergistically inclined adventurers these days.≺Prompt≻

If you are curious what manner of aperture may be etched into a particular piece of equipment, you need only trade it to me or one of my colleagues.≺Prompt≻
As a general rule, the higher the level of the item in question, the more difficult the synergy process for creating an aperture will be.≺Prompt≻
You will find that certain pieces of equipment may be etched with multiple apertures. It is, however, only possible to create one aperture at a time.≺Prompt≻
Etching requires the use of a corrosive substance we call mordant. Deposit mordant into a synergy furnace along with your equipment, and the process will begin.≺Prompt≻
My colleagues and I have a stock of mordant available for sale. The best way to learn is to practice, so if you're curious, we encourage you to purchase some and begin experimenting!≺Prompt≻
The difficulty of the synergy process when embedding evolith is decided by a number of factors.≺Prompt≻

Such factors include the variety of aperture and evolith, as well as the quantity of evolith you seek to attach. Embedding the first piece is not too difficult a task, but the second and third pieces will not go in so easily.≺Prompt≻
To begin the embedding process, deposit your evolith into the synergy furnace along with a piece of equipment with a compatible aperture.≺Prompt≻
When etching or embedding, the required elemental balance may be confirmed at any time during the synergy process, so let this be your guide.≺Prompt≻
Should you ever wish to remove any apertures and embedded evolith from a piece of equipment entirely, you may do so with an ingredient we call ≺Set Color #5≻revertant≺Set Color #1≻.≺Prompt≻

Toss the revertant in a synergy furnace along with your equipment, and its potent powers will restore your item to a pure and pristine state! Be warned, however, that embedded evolith will be lost forever in the process.≺Prompt≻

As you are no doubt already aware, synergy makes use of a highly combustible form of elemental crystals that we call “fewell.” The more complex the recipe, the greater the quantity of fewell required.≺Prompt≻
Veteran synergists know well the hassle of having to constantly monitor their fewell supply and procure crystals to replenish depleted stock.≺Prompt≻
To free you of such trifling burdens and allow you to focus your mind entirely on your art, we synergy engineers are offering a convenient fewell replenishment service!≺Prompt≻
For a nominal fee calculated based upon the current state of your fewell reserves, we will instantly refill you to full capacity.≺Prompt≻

Ah, synergy techniques! Those handy tricks of the trade that can mean the difference between a shiny new item and a major furnace meltdown.≺Prompt≻

My colleagues and I are always eager to train fellow synergists in a wide range of techniques. We can't do it all, though--you'll need to hone your synergy skill in order to benefit from our instruction.≺Prompt≻

Bear in mind that certain techniques can only be imparted to students possessing specialized crafting knowledge. For example, only skilled smiths will be able to comprehend the method for more efficient fewell feeding.≺Prompt≻

Word has it that there are also pieces of equipment that can impart hidden synergy techniques to the wearer. These, too, are said to be only accessible to skilled crafters.≺Prompt≻
The moral of the story is this: while synergy skill is important, neglect not your other crafting skills. To become a true synergy master, finding the proper balance is key.≺Prompt≻
Synergy remains a young discipline, and researchers back at the institute are burning the midnight fewell in the hopes of uncovering the next breakthrough in our field.≺Prompt≻

Welcome to the MHMU's porter service, kupo! Which of your burdensome belongings shall I take off your hands today?≺Prompt≻
Do something, kupo? ≺Selection Dialog≻Porter service? Buy a storage slip. No, thank you.≺Prompt≻
Is your gobbiebag splitting at the seams? Mog Safe spilling over? Why, an accomplished adventurer like yourself surely has more stuff than you know what to do with.≺Prompt≻
That's where I come in, kupo. I'll gladly hold onto your prized possessions, freeing you space to gather up even grander goodies.≺Prompt≻
To make use of my services, first you'll need to buy one of these storage slips for the low, low fee of ≺Numeric Parameter 19≻ gil.≺Prompt≻
Storage slips come in numerous varieties, kupo, each corresponding to a different type of item.≺Prompt≻
You'll want to peruse the fine print closely, so you don't end up paying good gil for a scrap of parchment useless for the particular item you wish to store.≺Prompt≻
Not that we moogles would object to that sort of donation, kupo.≺Prompt≻
Choose the item you wish to entrust, then trade it to me along with a single storage slip. I will take the item and return the slip to you, marked with an invisible seal.≺Prompt≻
Invisible to you, at least. It's plain as day to us moogles, so don't even think of trying to pull one over on us, kupo.≺Prompt≻
When it comes time to retrieve your item, just trade to me a single storage slip--any slip--once again.≺Prompt≻
I will present you with a list of all the items currently in my care, and you may choose the one you wish to withdraw. Simple as that, kupo!≺Prompt≻
What's more, no additional transaction fees will be incurred! Pretty generous of us for a change, no?≺Prompt≻
Now I bet you're wondering what the catch is, kupo. So as not to disappoint you, there are a few!≺Prompt≻
For one, any signed items will lose their signatures if you store them with me.≺Prompt≻
Why, you say? Hey, even we moogles aren't perfect! It's better for both of us if you keep your most precious possessions close at hand, kupo.≺Prompt≻
Now listen up, because there's another catch, and it's a doozy.≺Prompt≻

If you lose your storage slip, I won't be able to return your item. Ever. No ifs, ands, or buts! No “I'm sorry, Mister Porter Moogle, it'll never happen again!” Rules are rules, kupo, and someone has to keep them.≺Prompt≻
Last, but not least, I can't accept equipment bearing Magian trial insignia.≺Prompt≻
If you have such an item that you're simply dying to entrust to me, you'll have to abandon your trial first, kupo.≺Prompt≻
And that's all there is to it. This humble moogle can hardly wait to serve you!≺Prompt≻

Have you heard of the Meebles before?≺Prompt≻
They're a subterranean race of beastmen that strikingly resemble moles. No need to get your britches in a bunch if you haven't, though--studying them is our job.≺Prompt≻

We, the Meeble Burrows Exploration Committee, have left no stone--figurative or real--unturned in our search for answers about this elusive species. Our results suggest that Meebles are rather docile creatures, with little if any culture to speak of. They shouldn't pose much of a threat.≺Prompt≻
They're easily manipulated, though, and the Moblins have taken advantage of that. They put the Meebles to work throughout a network of burrows.≺Prompt≻

You adventurers can help us collect data by embarking on certain expeditions belowground. The goals and activities for each journey you undertake will vary, so this won't be just some routine experiment.≺Prompt≻

Swarms of vicious fiends have been impeding our scientific discoveries! Therefore, we'd like for you to utterly obliterate as many of them as possible...in the name of knowledge!≺Prompt≻
This expedition involves collecting data at certain Points deep within the caverns...stealthily. Don't get found by anything there, or you'll come back empty-handed.≺Prompt≻

Like moths to flame, the beasts in these caves are attracted to Subterranean Safepoint fire. Extinguish the torches to disperse the hordes...but not too fast. Extinguish multiple ones at once and you'll attract unwelcome guests.≺Prompt≻

“Endeavor to find the most expeditious route from the specified points to increase research productivity.” Wow, you'd think whoever made this objective could be a little more direct. Anyway, you may not need this advice, but try not to get found by any enemies along the way.≺Prompt≻

Swarms of vicious fiends have been impeding our scientific discoveries! Therefore, we'd like for you to utterly obliterate as many of them as possible...without injuring any Snarling Meebles, for they're the subject of our research at the moment.≺Prompt≻

For the cost of just a few ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%ｃ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ an expedition, you too can help save the lives of starving Meebles. Please, think of the Meebles and do the right thing.≺Prompt≻

This expedition aims to improve research efficiency by having you find the shortest route from point myeh to point gah. Oh, those names aren't the product of apathy on my part. I'm subtly hinting that the routes change depending on the time of day you enter. Whoops, so much for subtlety.≺Prompt≻

Those Varanefts and Tectochuks are enigmas wrapped in riddles encased in gobs of mystery. Yummy, yummy mystery. This expedition tasks you with unwrapping and sucking every last drop of mystery out of their behavior.≺Prompt≻

We'd like you to develop an intimate relationship with certain subjects down there. The catch is that they're not very friendly, so you'll need to endure some of their blows first. Go unconscious, though, and it'll be harder to collect the right data.≺Prompt≻

Ready for a little reconnaissance? We need someone to clear the way for “big boys” to do “real researcher's work.” Pompous jerks. Anyway, this sounds obvious, but try not to get knocked out, okay?≺Prompt≻

Treasure for everyone! The MBEC has unearthed lots of chests down belowground! Experience has proven that some of those chests are just monsters lying in wait, though...so we've decided to send adventurers down there first.≺Prompt≻

Swarms of vicious fiends have been impeding our scientific discoveries! Therefore, we'd like for you to utterly obliterate as many of them as possible...which may require you to go for a swim!≺Prompt≻

“Even filthy bloodsuckers like Hirudinids and Stagdellas can offer scientific insights,” my tail! We've tried everything and haven't found a single piece of data worthy of analysis, so...uh...try slaying them at the same time? I don't know.≺Prompt≻

“Just when we thought it was okay to implement the scientific method again, our fellow researchers get attacked by notarizing monarchs!” Wait a minute! When I find the dolt who wrote this report...≺Prompt≻

You've researched the rest, so now it's time to take on the best! Brave close encounters with the burrows' most feral fiends to receive glory, gil, and ≺Multiple Choice (Player Gender)≻[girls/guys]! ...Wait, we don't have the funds for those last two.≺Prompt≻

The goal of this expedition is to compile data regarding certain points within the burrows. The area is crawling with annoying Mafic Maroliths, though. We know that they possess a hive mentality, so as long as you take some down, the others should get the point.≺Prompt≻

Ever feel like you're being watched? I do all the time. My superiors tell me that our activities are being monitored by enemies...though not by the evil rarab in my closet, as I'd suggested. But what do they know!? Try and beat them at their own game and best them without getting detected. Then maybe I can get some sleep at night.≺Prompt≻

The Meebles we were observing have been attacked! Oh, the Galkanity! The Elvaanity! The...I'm so flustered I can't think! Please save them! Without their cute little snouts and endearing gruff talk, what else is left in the world to enjoy!?≺Prompt≻

Like moths to flame, the beasts in these caves are attracted to Subterranean Leohtfaet fire. Extinguish the torches to disperse the hordes...but not the Meebles. Spare the Meebles at all costs.≺Prompt≻

Those adorable Meebles are at it again, collecting ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%ｃ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ like they were real miners. Indulge them in their harmless fantasy and try finding ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%ｃ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ at mining points throughout the caves. Pretty please?≺Prompt≻
Swarms of vicious fiends have been impeding our scientific discoveries! Therefore, we'd like for you to utterly obliterate as many of them as possible.≺Prompt≻

The goal of this expedition is to compile data regarding certain points within the burrows. For this one, they've even been pre-numbered for you! All you need to do is examine them in order from youngest to oldest. What, that's not how you say it? You mustn't be from around here.≺Prompt≻
Those dastardly little buggers are breaking our Burrows Depthmarker! Show them that science always shines brightest by defending the Burrows Depthmarker for as long as possible!≺Prompt≻
On this expedition, you'll have to make as many hot-tempered bombs as possible self-destruct. Sounds like your best bet is to insult their cooking. Thanks, I'll be here for all eternity.≺Prompt≻

Moblins are supposedly gathering certain “elaborate parts” from treasure chests and fallen fiends. We don't know exactly what manner of confounding contraption they intend to contrive, but bring us enough parts and we'll <ahem> “piece it together.”≺Prompt≻

Don'tcha think dat furrowed brow and cocked head o' yers escaped me. Yer int'rested in dis chest, ain'tcha? Well, ya gots good right tah be, 'cause even us Gobbies is fascimanated wit' it. It's some sorta myst'ry box salvaged from a shipwreck in da Gugru Blue! Da mysterious part is dat what goes in don't necessarilies come out!≺Prompt≻

While I may tout its amazin'ness, don'tcha think fer even a second dat I's at liberty tah divulge hows we came by it. Still, I likes yer face. It's a kind face, one dat says ya won't stabs me in da back, which is more'n I can say fer my own mum. Lemme shows ya how to use dis myst'ry box.≺Prompt≻

Bah-dah-bah-dahm dah-daaahm! ≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 36) 1≻ Ya open da chest. Dat's it. And da kicker be dat I'm da one doin' da openin'. Ya just gets tah stand dere gawkin' in astonishmament. Easy gig, no?≺Prompt≻
Oh yeah, 'fore I forget. What good's a chest if ya ain't gots da key? Well, da key to dis chest is da fine art o' waitin'.≺Prompt≻
Ya wantsa know da hows n' da whys? Well da bosses had our tinkers tinkerin' on troo' da night and dey foun' dat...≺Prompt≻

Well, dey foun' dat we really gots no idea why da loot changes. Anywho, ya's wanna wait 'n wait 'n wait, den keep on waitin' some more. "Good things come tah dose who wait," right? Well, da longer ya wait, da gooder da thing...maybe. Ya just never know wit' a myst'ry box.≺Prompt≻

Also, I calls da amount o' time ya's waited yer circa...circama...circamadamian...ugh, yer “daily tally.” It ain't just da name dat's catchy, though. Da higher yer tally, da gooder yer goods get! Can't get much good--er, simpler dan dat.≺Prompt≻
Finally, ya opens da chest. Oooh, I can barely contain m'self thinkin' o' all da riches I--er, ya could have!≺Prompt≻
Oh, dat's right! Heyheyhey, got any items ya won't be needin'? If so, fork 'em over 'n yer daily tally'll increase! Mebbe not by much, but dat's better'n nothin', am I right?≺Prompt≻

And dere's no better feelin' dan takin' trash and turnin' it into treasure. It's pramactically a new kind o' alchemy! But don't go gung ho 'n overfills da thing 'til its hinges break. Myst'ry boxes don't grow on goobbues, y'know.≺Prompt≻

Plus, I'll be here tah stops ya if I sees ya stuffin' whole Gobbiebags worth o' possessions in dere, so don't worry yer oversized noggin' over and over over it. Whats was I sayin' again? Ugh, never mind.≺Prompt≻
Sadly, howsever, anodda myst'ry 'bout dis chest is dat it won't takes just any ol' bauble. It has da taste o' a picky peiste--it feasts upon nothin' but da rarest and unique-est o' artifacts.≺Prompt≻

Lastly, since we don't knows where da items go once inside, ya ain't gettin' nothin' back datcha put in. Ya reap whatcha sow, and da weather ain't always condusimasive to a good harvest, am I right? My condolemances in advance for any losses ya mights incur from da myst'ry box's fickle nature.≺Prompt≻
Dat all make 'nough sense tah ya? Just say da woid when ya wanna use my services. I's more'n happy tah help.≺Prompt≻

Hey! I rem'mber seein' yer foice 'round here. Take a looksie. I's taken' it upon myself tah jigger 'round wit' dese all-new myst'ry boxes, found straight from an ol' capsized vessel in the Gugru Blue.≺Prompt≻
I's nevah gonna say how we gots our hands on 'em, so dun even ask! But, still, I gots tah say dat dese're somet'in' special! Now try yer hand 'fore I smack ya!≺Prompt≻
Just select yer desir'd dial and plug 'way at it. Will ya win somethin' super special? Or will't be da booby proize?≺Prompt≻
Dese're some “special dials,” an' I gots no inklin' what's inside. Ya gots tah open 'em yerself tah find out what treasures lie within!≺Prompt≻
Oh ho, I's forgettin' tah explain somethin' to ya. See dese “special dials”? Dey're super primo, but I still no know wut's gonna be in dere.≺Prompt≻
So I's not be takin' no responsibility if somethin' weird 'n wacky comes out. Got it? Ya open it, ya keep it.≺Prompt≻
'N openin' 'em requires some kinda secret technique. Maybe it'll succeed, maybe tha box'll break. 'Sif I know. But ya can only try 'em once a day.≺Prompt≻
Oho, ya feelin' lucky 'nough tah takes a stab at da myst'ry box?≺Prompt≻
